languageKey.label: Comments and ratings
EXT:toctoccommentsce/ext_icon.gif

The options you can setup for commenting in a content element are sent to extension toctoc_comments. Note that the basic configuration of toctoc_comments is responsible for all other aspects of the look and feel of the commenting feature.
Defines operation mode of the plugin

"Normal" mode for use of social network components, including commenting, reviews, ratings and sharing. The other operation modes show specific views on the data: "Recent Comments" displays a recent comments list. "Top ratings" displays top rated records. "User Center" displays all comments and ratings of a logged in user. "Search comments" displays a form for searching comments.
Plugin to table map for linking records of other extensions to "Comments and ratings"

The plugin to table map triggers specific records like News, Products or other records with associated comments, reviews or ratings. If you miss Plugin to table maps in your database you can let import a first set of them by toctoc_comments. Please refer to toctoc_comments extensions configuration in extension manager, option database.importDataprefixtotable
Enable Comments, reviews, ratings or sharing
Enable this adds after the content element Comments, reviews, ratings or sharing
Comments or reviews
Show comments or reviews (or none of both)
Enable ratings
Enables web site visitors to rate comments or records.
Enable sharing
Enables sharing for social networks like Facebook, Google and Twitter
Donation message
This message either displays a link for you to make a donation for this wonderful software, or if you did, it displays a honourable donor message.
